turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need help managing my bank account. I'm trying to figure out why a large transaction posted yesterday.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. Please provide the last four digits of the account associated with the transaction, and I can look into it for you.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's ending in 1234. But the transaction details just say 'Online Payment'. That's not very helpful! Can you give me more information than that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Unfortunately, for security reasons, I can only provide the basic transaction details available on your account. I can see the date, amount, and the 'Online Payment' description.  However, the system isn't showing a more specific merchant or location, which can sometimes happen. If you'd like to inquire further, you will need to contact a human representative to get more detailed information on the transaction.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, that's annoying. Okay, well, thanks for trying. Can you help me set up a recurring transfer to my savings account then? I want to move $200 every month.
